pages.title: Teleport
pages.text: $(bold)COST: Lv1 = $(spell) + $(#044331)Ender Pearl$() $(br)$(bold)Lv2 = $(spell) + $(#71014E)Chorus Fruit$()$(br)$(bold)Lv3 = $(spell) + $(#C6028B)Chorus Flower$()$(br2)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)3$()$(br2)$(bold)XP COST:$() 【 Lv1 = $(#green)12$() 】•【 Lv2 = $(#green)18$() 】•【 Lv3 = $(#green)24$() 】$(br2)$(italic)''The ultimate spell for clearing out your path, teleport ennemies away from you.''$()

When you cast $(#9714CB)$(bold)Teleport$(), a small quantum projectile is cast from your scroll. $(br2)When $(#9714CB)$(bold)Teleport$() hits an entity, it will randomly teleport them in a certain radius in order to leave you alone. $(br2)However, the higher $(bold)Level$() the spell is, the further the range the radius will be. $(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
